catalog_script_client.name: Display fields based on product type
catalog_script_client.sys_name: Display fields based on product type

sys_update_version.name: catalog_script_client_698e853e47a24150b0ce8b42e36d4352
sys_update_version.payload:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update sys_domain="global" table="catalog_script_client"><catalog_script_client action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE"><active>false</active><applies_catalog>true</applies_catalog><applies_extended>false</applies_extended><applies_req_item>false</applies_req_item><applies_sc_task>false</applies_sc_task><applies_target_record>false</applies_target_record><applies_to>set</applies_to><cat_item/><cat_variable>IO:3aa7f61e1bee4d10a4236313604bcb82</cat_variable><condition/><description/><field/><global>true</global><isolate_script>false</isolate_script><messages/><name>Display fields based on product type</name><order/><script><![CDATA[function onChange(control, oldValue, newValue, isLoading) 
{
   if (isLoading || newValue == '') 
   {
      return;
   }

	var request_support_for = g_form.getValue('request_support_for');
	var request_type = g_form.getValue('request_type');
	
	var cur_soldproduct = g_form.getValue('product_model');
	var cur_installbaseitem = g_form.getValue('serial_number');

	var ga = new GlideAjax('Support_case');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_name', 'getProductCategory');
	ga.addParam('sysparm_installbase', cur_installbaseitem);
	ga.getXML(getResponse);
   
	function getResponse(response) 
	{
		var answerproduct = response.responseXML.documentElement.getAttribute('answer');
	
		if (request_support_for == 'incident_notification' || (request_support_for == 'remote_technical_support' && request_type == 'mechanical_support'))  
		{
			
			if (answerproduct == 'Diesel Engine' || answerproduct == 'Gas Engine')   
			{
				g_form.setVisible('coolant_specification', true);
				g_form.setVisible('fuel_specification', true);
				g_form.setVisible('def_specification', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('coolant_specification', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('fuel_specification', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('def_specification', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('oil_specification', true);
				
				g_form.setMandatory('hydraulic_system_circuit_type', false);
				g_form.setVisible('hydraulic_system_circuit_type', false);
				g_form.setVisible('malfunction_case',false);
				g_form.setVisible('oil_specification', true);
				
			}
			
			if (answerproduct == 'Motors' || answerproduct == 'Pumps') 
			{
					
				g_form.setVisible('hydraulic_system_circuit_type', true);
				g_form.setVisible('oil_specification', true);
				g_form.setVisible('malfunction_case',true);
				g_form.setMandatory('hydraulic_system_circuit_type', true);
				g_form.setMandatory('oil_specification', true);
				
				g_form.setVisible('hydraulic_system_circuit_type', true);
				g_form.setVisible('malfunction_case',true);
				
				g_form.setMandatory('coolant_specification', false);
				g_form.setMandatory('fuel_specification', false);
				g_form.setMandatory('def_specification', false);
				g_form.setVisible('coolant_specification', false);
				g_form.setVisible('fuel_specification', false);
				g_form.setVisible('def_specification', false);
				g_form.setVisible('failure_code', false);
				
			}
		}
	}
}]]></script><sys_class_name>catalog_script_client</sys_class_name><sys_created_by>michel.boberda@liebherr.com</sys_created_by><sys_created_on>2022-04-02 21:07:07</sys_created_on><sys_domain>global</sys_domain><sys_domain_path>/</sys_domain_path><sys_id>698e853e47a24150b0ce8b42e36d4352</sys_id><sys_mod_count>16</sys_mod_count><sys_name>Display fields based on product type</sys_name><sys_overrides/><sys_package display_value="Support case" source="x_liisa_support_ca">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_package><sys_policy/><sys_scope display_value="Support case">80d47c06dba7f05001eafad3f3961926</sys_scope><sys_update_name>catalog_script_client_698e853e47a24150b0ce8b42e36d4352</sys_update_name><sys_updated_by>admin</sys_updated_by><sys_updated_on>2023-04-16 16:51:04</sys_updated_on><table/><type>onChange</type><ui_type>10</ui_type><variable_set display_value="Technical Support - Information">6047b21e1bee4d10a4236313604bcb4b</variable_set><view/></catalog_script_client></record_update>
sys_update_version.record_name: Display fields based on product type

sys_metadata_delete.sys_name: Display fields based on product type
